short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reminds you if you're on localhost, staging, or production environments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Environment Notifier for Developers

Easily keep track of the environment you’re working in—whether it’s Localhost, Staging, or Development—with this handy Chrome extension. Perfect for developers who frequently switch between multiple environments, this extension detects the current environment based on the URL and provides clear notifications to prevent confusion.

When hovering over it, it will disappear, do not fear! It will come back in a few seconds!

Features:

	•	Automatic Detection: Instantly recognises environments based on keywords in the URL, such as “localhost,” “staging,” and “dev.”
	•	Discreet Notifications: Shows an environment notification only when relevant, so you can focus on the right environment without unnecessary distractions.
	•	Error Handling: Safely processes URLs and avoids accidental notifications for production or unknown environments.

Who It’s For:
Designed for developers, testers, and anyone working across various stages of development, this extension streamlines environment tracking, minimizing the risk of making changes in the wrong environment.
